p: A descriptive cross-sectional study was conducted in October 2016 and June–August 2017 at outpatient clinics at Lázaro Cárdenas, a port city in the state of Michoacán, México, where arboviruses are endemic. A total of 68 samples were collected and processed for anti-CHIKV IgM and IgG ELISA. Fifteen samples from healthy donors were collected in Morelia, the capital city in the state of Michoacán, where the circulation of CHIKV is not considered to be endemic.
